definition: high-spirited/full of mettle
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The professor on his own mettle strives to scale new heights in science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 這位教授意氣風發，努力攀登科學技術的新高峯。
雄心壯志使他意氣風發。
